Title: Nisshartho Bhalobasha: What is Love!
Actors: Ananta Jalil, Afiea Nusrat Barsha, Misa Sawdagar, Sucharita
Plot: Nishwartha Bhalobasa (English: Selfless Love) is Bangladeshi romantic-action-comedy film directed by Ananta Jalil. starring Ananta and Barsha in the lead roles. The film is produced by ...
